00033 void DATFileWriterTest::testCreation()
00034 {
00035         DATData fHdr("DAT_file");
00036         DATFileWriter* w = new DATFileWriter(fHdr);
00037         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00038         delete w;
00039 }
00040 
00041 void DATFileWriterTest::WriteTest()
00042 {
00043         DATData data("DAT_file");
00044         data.SetPixelCount(10);
00045         data.SetStatsCount(10);
00046         DATFileWriter* writer = new DATFileWriter(data);
00047         u_int16_t stat1 = 16;
00048         u_int16_t stat2 = 22;
00049         Uint16Vector stats;
00050         stats.push_back(stat1);
00051         stats.push_back(stat2);
00052         writer->WriteStats(stats);
00053 
00054         u_int16_t p1 = 36;
00055         u_int16_t p2 = 3;
00056         Uint16Vector pixels;
00057         pixels.push_back(p1);
00058         pixels.push_back(p2);
00059         writer->WritePixels(pixels);
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00061         delete writer;
00062 }
